innates.gaindice: gets an extra dice every turn
innates.vampire: can only be killed with a wooden stake
innates.immunestatus: is immune to lock and freeze
innates.altvampire: revives to full health when defeated (once)

slots.FREE1: Adds a free 1 to the card
slots.FREE2: Adds a free 2 to the card
slots.FREE3: Adds a free 3 to the card
slots.FREE4: Adds a free 4 to the card
slots.FREE5: Adds a free 5 to the card
slots.FREE6: Adds a free 6 to the card
slots.EVEN: The number has to be even
slots.ODD: The number has to be odd
slots.WITCH: Used internally for the Witch's Spellbook
slots.SKILL: Currently not in use. Will eventually be used for jester backup style cards
slots.DOUBLES: The slot needs a second slot with the same number
slots.LOCKED2: Robot card, you need to roll 2 dice before you can use it
slots.LOCKED3: Robot card, you need to roll 3 dice before you can use it
slots.LOCKED4: Robot card, you need to roll 4 dice before you can use it
slots.LOCKED5: Robot card, you need to roll 5 dice before you can use it
slots.LOCKED6: Robot card, you need to roll 6 dice before you can use it
slots.LOCKED7: Robot card, you need to roll 7 dice before you can use it
slots.SPARE1: Card will contain a dice with the value 1 which you can use
slots.SPARE2: Card will contain a dice with the value 2 which you can use
slots.SPARE3: Card will contain a dice with the value 3 which you can use
slots.SPARE4: Card will contain a dice with the value 4 which you can use
slots.SPARE5: Card will contain a dice with the value 5 which you can use
slots.SPARE6: Card will contain a dice with the value 6 which you can use
slots.RANGE23: Requires a number between 2 and 3 (including both)
slots.RANGE24: Requires a number between 2 and 4 (including both)
slots.RANGE25: Requires a number between 2 and 5 (including both)
slots.RANGE34: Requires a number between 3 and 4 (including both)
slots.RANGE35: Requires a number between 3 and 5 (including both)
slots.RANGE45: Requires a number between 4 and 5 (including both)

upgrade_modifier.simplify: Generally makes a card much easier to play. EVEN -> NORMAL, REQUIRE1 -> ODD, MAX and MIN slots become NORMAL.
upgrade_modifier.increaserange: Makes a card slightly easier to play. MAX3 -> MAX4.
upgrade_modifier.everyturn: Makes a card that is normally once per battle available to use every turn.
upgrade_modifier.halfcountdown: Halves the countdown on the card. e.g. 10 -> 5
upgrade_modifier.twothirdcountdown: Reduces the countdown on a card to 2/3rds. e.g. 9 -> 6
upgrade_modifier.threequartercountdown: Reduces the countdown on a card to 3/4s. e.g. 12 -> 9
upgrade_modifier.thirdcountdown: Reduces the countdown on a card to 1/3rds. e.g. 9 -> 3
upgrade_modifier.quartercountdown: Reduces the countdown on a card to 1/4s. e.g. 12 -> 3
upgrade_modifier.add1: Adds a FREE1 slot to the card.
upgrade_modifier.add2: Adds a FREE2 slot to the card.
upgrade_modifier.add3: Adds a FREE3 slot to the card.
upgrade_modifier.add4: Adds a FREE4 slot to the card.
upgrade_modifier.add5: Adds a FREE5 slot to the card.
upgrade_modifier.add6: Adds a FREE6 slot to the card.
upgrade_modifier.reducesize: Reduces a size 2 card to size 1.
upgrade_modifier.change_power: Change this card to the one defined in the upgraded tab.
upgrade_modifier.change_backfire: Works like change_power, but while upgrading the ingame text says it reduces a card's power instead of increasing it.
upgrade_modifier.change_boomerang: Likely works the same as change_power, but as a legacy version for Boomerang.
upgrade_modifier.change_countdown: Likely works the same as change_power, but as a legacy version for Countdowns.
upgrade_modifier.change_description: Likely works the same as change_power, but as a legacy version for "Description".
upgrade_modifier.change_poison: Likely works the same as change_power, but as a legacy version for Poison.
upgrade_modifier.change_requirements: Likely works the same as change_power, but as a legacy version for Requirements.

weaken_modifier.change_power: Change this card to the one defined in the downgraded tab.
weaken_modifier.change_function: Change this card to the one defined in the downgraded tab.
weaken_modifier.complicate: Generally makes a card much harder to play. NORMAL -> MAX3, EVEN -> REQUIRE6, ODD -> REQUIRE5.
weaken_modifier.decreaserange: Makes a card slightly harder to play. MAX4 -> MAX3.
weaken_modifier.doublerequirements: Adds a copy of the first slot to the card. REQUIRE6 -> two REQUIRE6 slots.
weaken_modifier.noeffect: Changes to do nothing when used.
weaken_modifier.removereusable: If a card is reusable or multi use, change to be only usable once this turn.
weaken_modifier.changetotal9: If a card has two slots that need a total value, change that total to 9.
weaken_modifier.changetotal10: If a card has two slots that need a total value, change that total to 10.
weaken_modifier.changetotal11: If a card has two slots that need a total value, change that total to 11.
weaken_modifier.changetotal12: If a card has two slots that need a total value, change that total to 12.
weaken_modifier.burnsparedice: Used for the spare dice card. The spare dice on the card will be burning.

default_tags.monstercard: Only shows in the final episode
default_tags.excludefromrandomlists: This equipment won't be randomly selected with skills like Slot Machine
default_tags.robotonly: Only useable by the Robot (or custom characters with CPU)
default_tags.witchonly: Only useable by the Witch (or custom characters with a Spellbook)
default_tags.shockavoid: Do not consider this equipment for Shock
default_tags.weakenavoid: Do not consider this equipment for Weaken
default_tags.altpoisonavoid: Do not consider this equipment for Alternate Poison
default_tags.curseavoid: This equipment never triggers curse even if the odds are set to 100%
default_tags.curseattract: This equipment always triggers curse if inflicted even if the odds are set to 0%
default_tags.appearsforparts: Appears as a scrap option for Inventor
default_tags.hidereuseable: Don't show that this equipment is reuseable
default_tags.alternateversion: This equipment is a Parallel Universe version of another
default_tags.workout: This equipment is a Workout card
default_tags.destroy: Destroyed when used (note that some workout cards don't have this)
default_tags.halloweenspecial: This equipment is from the Halloween Special
default_tags.reunion: This equipment is from the Reunion DLC
default_tags.guestitem: This equipment is a guest item
